title: GREEN: Implement Startup, ICP with as/at/are/using/to
description:
Implement types to make tests pass:

**Startup**
- name, description, pitch
- stage: 'idea' | 'validating' | 'building' | 'scaling' | 'established'
- founded, website, industry
- relationships to ICP, Founders, Ideas

**ICP** (Ideal Customer Profile)
- as: persona/role description
- at: company/context description  
- are: current state/pain points
- using: current solutions
- to: desired outcome/job to be done

Both types should include $type, $id, and standard metadata fields.

title: REFACTOR: Export validation types with schema URLs
description:
Refactor and finalize validation framework types:

- Add schema.org.ai URL references for Idea, Hypothesis, JTBD
- Export from types/index.ts
- Add JSDoc documentation
- Create type guards for status validation
- Ensure relationships are properly typed

title: startup-builder - Startup types for schema.org.ai
description:
Implement comprehensive Startup-related types for schema.org.ai including:

- **Startup** - Central entity with lifecycle states
- **ICP** - Ideal Customer Profile (as/at/are/using/to framework)
- **Idea** - Concept with pitch and status
- **Hypothesis** - Testable assumptions
- **JTBD** - Jobs To Be Done framework
- **LeanCanvas** - 9-box business model
- **StoryBrand** - Narrative framework
- **Founder** - Founder entity with capabilities

Following TDD (Test-Driven Development) methodology with RED-GREEN-REFACTOR cycles.

title: RED: Write failing tests for LeanCanvas, StoryBrand, Founder
description:
Write comprehensive failing tests for business model framework types:

**LeanCanvas** (9-box model)
- problem, solution, uniqueValueProposition
- unfairAdvantage, customerSegments, keyMetrics
- channels, costStructure, revenueStreams

**StoryBrand** (7-part narrative)
- character, problem, guide
- plan, callToAction, failure, success

**Founder**
- name, email, role, skills
- relationship to Startup
- capabilities and expertise areas

title: GREEN: Implement validation framework types
description:
Implement Idea, Hypothesis, and JTBD types to make tests pass:

**Idea**
- Core fields: name, pitch, description, status
- Relationships to Startup, Hypotheses

**Hypothesis**  
- Core fields: statement, metric, target, status
- Evidence array for test results
- Relationship to Idea

**JTBD**
- situation, motivation, outcome (When/I want/So I can)
- functional, emotional, social job dimensions
- priority and frequency fields

title: GREEN: Implement business model framework types
description:
Implement LeanCanvas, StoryBrand, and Founder types to make tests pass:

**LeanCanvas**
- All 9 boxes as structured fields
- Relationship to Startup
- Version tracking for iterations

**StoryBrand**
- All 7 narrative elements
- Relationship to Startup and ICP
- Marketing copy generation support

**Founder**
- Identity and contact fields
- Skills and expertise arrays
- Role enum (CEO, CTO, CPO, etc.)
- Relationship to Startup (many-to-many)

title: REFACTOR: Export Startup, ICP, add schema.org.ai URLs
description:
Refactor and finalize Startup and ICP types:

- Add schema.org.ai URL references ($schema field)

title: RED: Write failing tests for Idea, Hypothesis, JTBD
description:
Write comprehensive failing tests for validation framework types:

**Idea**
- name, pitch, description
- status: 'raw' | 'refined' | 'validated' | 'rejected'
- relationship to Startup

**Hypothesis**
- statement, metric, target
- status: 'untested' | 'testing' | 'validated' | 'invalidated'
- evidence collection

**JTBD** (Jobs To Be Done)
- When [situation], I want to [motivation], so I can [outcome]
- functional, emotional, social dimensions

title: RED: Write failing tests for Startup, ICP types
description:
Write comprehensive failing tests for:

- **Startup** type with lifecycle states (idea, validating, building, scaling, established)
- **ICP** (Ideal Customer Profile) with as/at/are/using/to framework fields

Tests should cover:
- Type structure and required fields
- Lifecycle state transitions
- ICP framework completeness
- Relationships between Startup and ICP

title: REFACTOR: Final integration, exports, and schema.org.ai URLs
description:
Final refactor for all Startup types:

- Add schema.org.ai URLs for LeanCanvas, StoryBrand, Founder
- Create unified exports in types/index.ts
- Add comprehensive JSDoc documentation
- Create barrel exports for each type category
- Verify all inter-type relationships
- Add integration tests for full type system
- Update package exports if needed
